name: Pitch Lucy AI
description: Pitch Lucy is an AI-powered game platform where users interact with adversarial agent characters by submitting prompts designed to convince or outwit them. Each game is structured around a specific challenge, with successful participants earning token rewards. These interactions generate valuable behavioral and market data, which can be analyzed or monetized. The platform is powered by the $LUCYAI token, used for prompting fees, rewards, and gated features.
